item.title: My VScode Extension
item.description: sublime:插件 iterm：设置 filezilla office conda：/opt/anaconda3/ python:basemap,cartopy pannoly parallels desktop pycharm vscode ntfs for mac tuxera ntfs runcat matlab remote connection ncl:gcc,x11 jupyterlab app store 微信 wps 百度网盘 tencent meeting google chrome 有道词典 网易云音乐 360压缩 brew mac ports

item.title: My VScode Extension
item.description: 1、Git History 2、Markdown All in one 3、Jupyter 4、One Dark Pro 5、Python 6、Remote-SSH 7、vscode-icon 8、VSCodeFileHeader 9、NCL 还是不容sublime的 command + B 10、Remote Development 远程连接，加debug
